bugs.title: Newly created users were not able to complete the First Setup Wizard

enhancements.title: Support for custom images in the Installer
enhancements.description: Users can now use their own system images during the installation process. Usefull for OEMs and users who need specific firmware or drivers.

enhancements.title: New and improved translations
enhancements.description: One or more of the supported languages have been updated.
